section.name: 1 - Preliminaries
section.summary:
Objectives

By the end of this topic unit you should be able to:

  • Explain the meaning of "best estimate" and "uncertainty" of a measured quantity.
  • Calculate the best estimate and uncertainty of a measured quantity.
  • Determine whether two quantities agree within uncertainty.
  • Explain differences between scalars and vectors.
  • From written or pictorial information, express a vector in magnitude/direction form or in component form.
  • Convert vectors back and forth between magnitude/direction and component forms.
  • Add and subtract vectors, both graphically and algebraically.
